inclusion.criterion: gestational age between 20 weeks 0 days and 32 weeks 0 days of gestation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients able to read and write in English or Spanish
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of gestational diabetes mellitus using criteria supported by the American College of Obstetrics and Gynecology (ACOG)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients identified as not requiring medical therapy (insulin or glyburide) after the first week of initial blood glucose monitoring
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: diagnosis of GDM made by any method or criteria other than the one outlined above
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 16-year-old girl recently diagnosed with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and weakness affecting in her upper extremities.
